name: FlexibleGridLayout
short_description: FlexibleGridLayout aims to be a grid based Java Swing LayoutManager that is easier to use than a GridBagLayout but more powerful than a GridLayout (e.g. columns with different widths, elements spanning more than one cell, ...).
